short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts selected BTC value to Popular Fiat currencies according to current market price.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select the amount in Bitcoin, right click to convert it instantaneously to your local Fiat currency.

Very useful for frequent crypto users because they need to know the displayed BTC amount in their local currency and it becomes difficult to every time open up a new tab, find current market price and then calculate amount by multiplying it with price.

This extension removes this hassle and presents a straightforward solution.

Features :
>Currencies supported: AUD, BRL, CAD, CHF, CLP, CNY, DKK, EUR, GBP, HKD, INR, ISK, JPY, KRW, NZD, PLN, RUB, SEK, SGD, THB, TWD, USD
>Current Market price displayed as badge over extension icon and also on popup menu after clicking it
>Works on any webpage!

The source code is made open source: https://github.com/CodinMaster/BTC2Fiat
